Page._content:
PhD student

YOU Yufa ()

The Hong Kong Polytechnic University - Aeronautical and Aviation Engineering

Research focus: robotics, motion planning, and control for autonomous systems.

Email CV GitHub

About

I am currently a PhD student in the Department of Aeronautical and Aviation Engineering at The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, supervised by Prof. Huang Hailong. My research focuses on Robotics, exploring advanced planning and control algorithms for robots.

Previously, I worked as a Motion Planning Engineer at BYD Ltd. in the Autonomous Driving Unit, where I developed the E4APA Parking Assistance system for 4WD vehicles. I also contributed to the MPilot Self-Driving Project at Momenta Tech Ltd. for Mercedes-Benz and Toyota. I hold an M.S. in Control Engineering from Harbin Institute of Technology, where my research focused on vehicle motion planning in both on-road and open-space environments.

Achievement: National Award Winner at NXP Cup Intelligent Car Race (2019)

Featured Work

E4APA - 4WD Parking Assistance System

Advanced motion planning algorithms for autonomous parking in complex scenarios.

529K views 2.2k likes 308 comments
Path Planning Visualization
Racing with humans at OpenDay
Magic movements with 4DW

NXP Cup Intelligent Car Race - National Award

Autonomous vehicle control and navigation system for competitive racing.

Competition Performance
National Award Winner
Recognized for excellence in autonomous vehicle control algorithms and system integration.

GitHub Activity

Career

2025-Present
The Hong Kong Polytechnic University
PhD Student
2023-2025
BYD Motor Ltd.
Motion Planning Engineer
2022
Momenta Tech Ltd.
Algorithm Intern
2020-2023
Harbin Institute of Technology
M.S. in Control Engineering
2016-2020
Dalian Maritime University
B.Eng. in Automation

Selected Publications

A Hybrid Trajectory Planning Strategy for Intelligent Vehicles with Collision Avoidance

Y. You, L. Zhao, H. Liu and Z. Liu
2022 41st Chinese Control Conference (CCC), Hefei, China, 2022, pp. 5353-5358

PDF Thesis

Recent News

Oct 2024
Conducted AVP research in occupancy grid map.
Aug 2024
Release E4APA products to all BYD Yangwang U8 models.
May 2024
Develop 4WD parking planning algorithm in BYD Motor Ltd.
Oct 2023
Develop 4WD parking frame in BYD Motor Ltd.
Aug 2023
Joined BYD Motor Ltd. as a Motion Planning Engineer.
Jul 2023
Graduated from Harbin Institute of Technology.
Nov 2022
Joined Momenta.ai MPilot Group as a Motion Planning Intern.
Oct 2022
Joined Curling Robot Team in Harbin Institute of Technology.
Sep 2022
Conducted planning research in Baidu Apollo Self-Driving Platform.
Jul 2022
Submitted paper at Chinese Control Conference 2022.
